title: Get links of R books
text: goal bookmarkr provide links R books.

title: Get links of R books
text: can install development version bookmarkr GitHub :
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("edgar-treischl/bookmarkr") #Get links via:  rbooks::show_link("keyword") #> Error in `rbooks::show_link()`: #> ! Insert a book key word. Valid examples are: 'bookdown', 'dataviz', #>   'forgot_teach', 'fundamentals_dataviz', 'ggplot2', 'hands_on_R', #>   'master_shiny', 'plotly', 'pro-git', 'r_graphics', 'r_packages', 'r4ds', #>   'regression', 'rmarkdown_cookbook', 'text_mining' head(rbooks::links()) #>                               title     shortcut #> 1                R for Data Science         r4ds #> 2     Welcome to Text Mining with R  text_mining #> 3 bookdown: Authoring Books and ...     bookdown #> 4                   Mastering Shiny master_shiny #> 5                           Pro Git      pro-git #> 6               R Graphics Cookbook   r_graphics #>                                   link #> 1              https://r4ds.had.co.nz/ #> 2      https://www.tidytextmining.com/ #> 3 https://bookdown.org/yihui/bookdown/ #> 4         https://mastering-shiny.org/ #> 5       https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2 #> 6              https://r-graphics.org/
